DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine single session aerobic exercise effectively control blood pressure ( BP ) individual type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) 24h post-exercise period , effect intensity aerobic exercise BP response .
DOC.criteria: sedentary diagnosis T2DM least one year glycemic control nutrition and/or medication use exogenous insulin present chronic complication diabetic foot nephropathy retinopathy neuropathy cardiovascular disease
